attributes.action: Force social services by law to seek forensic evidence of domestic violence in order to prevent injustice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Force the social services by law to seek forensic evidence for domestic violence claims whenever the accused denies having committed domestic violence.
Also, take into consideration that men ARE subject also to domestic violence from their wives, in certain families, and sometimes injury may have been caused to the female in RETALIATION as an act of DEFENCE!

Forensic evidence of reports of domestic violence from a separate and independent body, ie. police, MUST be provided BEFORE a social worker is even allowed to accuse anybody of such activities in their reports. In order for this to be a just system, police must also be FORCED by law to seek forensic evidence as well as social workers BEFORE claims of domestic violence are taken serious.
Social services must also be prosecuted for perjury in court when they provide false evidence in reports!
